name: HELICRAFT PTY LTD
about: Helicraft Pty Ltd, based at Moorabbin Airport in Melbourne, is one of Victoriaâ€™s most respected helicopter training institutions. With over 20 years of experience, Helicraft specializes in commercial pilot licence (CPL), private pilot licence (PPL), and recreational pilot licence (RPL) training. Our commitment to safety, friendliness, reliability, and expertise has established an enviable reputation in the industry. We offer a wide range of helicopter services, including scenic flights, charter operations, and aerial work. Our training facilities are equipped to provide high-standard aviation education, ensuring students receive comprehensive and professional instruction. At Helicraft, we are dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals with excellence and integrity.
